natural 0
reservoir 0
in 0
the 0
bat, 0
which 0
does 0
not 0
itself 0

can 0
pass 0
the 0
microbe 0
on 0
to 0
humans 0
who 0
hunt 0
it 0
for 0

The 0
virus 0
is 0
handed 0
on 0
by 0
contact 0
with 0

fluids 0
-- 0
touching 0
a 0
sick 0

person 0
is 0

source 0

infection. 0

Following 0

and 0

Ebola 0

high 0

weakness, 0
intense 0
muscle 0
and 0

headaches 0
and 0

vomiting 0
and 0

skin 0

kidney 0
and 0

failure, 0
and 0

worst-ever 0

periods 0
where 0
the 0

is 0
either 0

calm 0
(the 0
minimum) 0

maximum). 0

but 0

there‚Äôs 0
a 0
pattern 0
behind 0
